nodes.text: The Corellian butterfly was a butterfly that lived in the swamps of Corellia. It had a long tail containing a stinger, and very large wings.
Corellian butterflies can be classified in several castes: drones, workers, warriors, defenders, and monarchs. While the drones were peaceful, the defenders were known to be aggressive.
Corellian butterfly meat was comestible. The cookbook Essential Cooking Skills detailed how to best cook that meat.

Corellian butterflies appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
